home.description: I am a passionate Full-Stack Developer with a knack for crafting robust and scalable web applications. My expertise lies in building dynamic user interfaces with React and Next.js, and developing efficient backend systems using Node.js and various database technologies.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and soft skills I work with
skills.aws_certification_provider: Amazon Web Services Training and Certification
skills.career_objective_description: Aspiring frontend developer with strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, aiming to build impactful and user-friendly web applications. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to innovative, high-quality solutions that drive organizational success.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects

ryde.title: Ryde
ryde.description: A Mobile Application That Connects Passengers With Drivers Using Their Personal Vehicles For Transportation. Features real-time location tracking, secure payment integration, and user-friendly interface for both passengers and drivers.

horizon.title: Horizon
horizon.description: An E-Commerce Website That Sells Printers To Customers With User-Friendly Interface. Features product catalog, shopping cart functionality, and responsive design for optimal user experience across all devices.

kitab_zone.title: Kitab-Zone
kitab_zone.description: A Web-Based Library Management System Designed To Automate Book Tracking, Borrowing, Reserving, And Administrative Tasks For Colleges. Includes user authentication, book search, and administrative dashboard.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss opportunities and collaborate on exciting projects
contact.promise_description: I typically respond to messages within 24 hours. For urgent matters, feel free to call me directly.
contact.message_placeholder: Tell me about your project or opportunity...
contact.alert_success: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
